p: Eligible patients are randomly assigned to the flurbiprofen axetil group or the no-NSAIDs group by a minimisation method using (1) institution, (2) clinical stage (IA1, 2/IA3, IB/IIA or more), and (3) sex because postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy varies according to stage, and the prognosis varies according to sex. 34 35 The randomisation ratio is 1:1. The results of the assignment will not be made known to the study subjects.
